title: Noam Chomsky, David Barsamian - Propaganda and the Public Mind
description:
Noam Chomsky, David Barsamian-Propaganda and the Public Mind-Haymarket Books (2015)

epub

Renowned interviewer David Barsamian showcases his unique access to Chomskyâ€™s thinking on a number of topics of contemporary and historical import. Chomsky offers insights into the institutions that shape the public mind in the service of power and profit. In an interview conducted after the important November 1999 Â“Battle in Seattle,â€ Chomsky discusses prospects for building a movement to challenge corporate domination of the media, the environment, and even our private lives. Whether discussing U.S. military escalation in Colombia, attacks on Social Security, or growing inequality worldwide, Chomsky shows how ordinary people, if they work together, have the power to make meaningful change.
